name: Avoid - Early in Development
description:
VERY EARLY IN DEVELOPMENT

// Update Alpha 2.1 LAST ALPHA RELEASE //

*edited the end screen

*new music test!

*zombies move faster as your score increases!

*pause/play buttons back!

Hope you enjoy!

// //

Also please leave a donation because it helps me a lot!

You have to move up and down ( W - up, S - down) and survive the monsters that want to kill you
